TEXT.TITLE: SPAIN TO SELL BARLEY TO SAUDI ARABIA
TEXT.BODY: Spain will shortly sign with Saudi Arabia an order for barley for April/May delivery, trade sources said. They gave no details on amounts or prices, but said it would be a "major" order. Saudi Arabia bought 500,000 tonnes of Spanish barley last year. Reuter
